entry.dcterms:creator: Hegedűs, Péter

entry.dcterms:description: The blocks of the TÁRKI 2012/02. omnibus survey: 1; Political attitude. 2; Assessment of one's own and the country's economic situation 3; Attitudes towards Vaclav Havel 4; Sensitive data protection 5; Smoking habits 6; Attitude toward the pricing of the Hungarian motorways
entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
political ideology
economic systems and development
social behaviour and attitudes
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
face-to-face interview
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
